article_title: Israel says war expected to continue throughout 2024
sentence: Some  21,978  people  -  mostly  women  and  children  -  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israel says war expected to continue throughout 2024
sentence: The  figures  included  156  people  killed  and  246  injured  in  the  last  24  hours,  the  ministry  added.

article_title: Israel says war expected to continue throughout 2024
sentence: The  latest  war  was  triggered  by  an  unprecedented  cross-border  attack  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  1,200  people  were  killed  -  most  of  them  civilians  -  and  about  240  others  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israel says war expected to continue throughout 2024
sentence: The  IDF  said  it  killed  a  senior  Hamas  commander  involved  in  the  7  October  attack,  Adil  Mismah,  in  an  overnight  strike  on  the  town  of  Deir  al-Balah.

article_title: Israel says war expected to continue throughout 2024
sentence: Witnesses  told  the  AFP  news  agency  that  another  strike  killed  20  people  sheltering  at  Al-Aqsa  University  in  the  city's  west.

article_title: Israel says war expected to continue throughout 2024
sentence: Another  strike  on  Monday  morning  was  said  to  have  killed  at  least  10  people  in  the  al-Maghazi  refugee  camp.
